recipe.title: Dilly Dip with Vegetables
recipe.description: Make this dip for your next gathering to enjoy not only vegetables but also low-fat dairy.
recipe.instructions:
Wash hands. Get out clean equipment and tools.
	Rinse parsley well and drain on clean paper towel. Mince enough for 2 Tablespoons.
	Rinse and peel onion. Rinse again. Finely chop enough for 2 Tablespoons.
	Measure yogurt and sour cream into a medium mixing bowl. Stir together to thoroughly combine.
	Add parsley, onion, dill weed, garlic powder, and salt. Add a dash of black pepper. Stir well to thoroughly mix all ingredients.
	Cover and refrigerate until time to serve.
	Prepare raw vegetables for dipping. Rinse well under running water, rubbing surface well. Drain. Trim and slice each vegetable to prepare pieces for dipping.
	Arrange the dip and prepared raw veggie dippers for serving.

ingredients_attributes.name: low fat or nonfat plain yogurt
assorted raw vegetables for dipping, such as broccoli, bell pepper, carrots, summer squash or zucchini, cucumber, and celery
ingredients_attributes.note: choose at least 2, allow 1/2 cup per person
